author: craigmcc
msg: Migrate global manifest constants to a new class (org.apache.struts.Globals)
that has no other content, so they can be referenced without requiring any

author: craigmcc
msg: Pass a SAX InputSource, with a system identifier, to the Digester used to
parse struts-config.xml files.  This allows struts-config.xml to use relative
references to other XML files within the WEB-INF subdirectory, in order to
partition the contents into multiple individual files.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a new servlet initialization parameter "rulesets" for ActionServlet,
that allows you to specify a comma-delimited list of fully qualified class
names of org.apache.commons.digester.RuleSet instances that will be added
to the Digester instance used to process struts-config.xml files for this

author: craigmcc
msg: Ensure that all the configured dynamic form bean classes have been created
at startup time, so that DynaActionFormClass.getDynaActionFormClass() will
always work.  As a side effect, this will catch problems with the specified
class name at webapp startup time instead of the first time this form bean
